A

C

changeFromToState(String, S, S...) - Method in class nl.fontys.sebivenlo.statewalker.ContextBase
Do a full transition from a current state to a new state with optional sub-states.
ContextBase<C extends ContextBase<C,D,S>,D extends Device<C,D,S>,S extends StateBase<C,D,S>> - Class in nl.fontys.sebivenlo.statewalker
Base class for all statewalker state machine contexts.
ContextBase(Class<?>) - Constructor for class nl.fontys.sebivenlo.statewalker.ContextBase
Create a context for a state machine with states of type stateClass.

D

Device<C extends ContextBase<C,D,S>,D extends Device<C,D,S>,S extends StateBase<C,D,S>> - Interface in nl.fontys.sebivenlo.statewalker
This empty interface should be extended or implemented to provide the type that is used by the context and or state to operate the device.

E

enter(C) - Method in interface nl.fontys.sebivenlo.statewalker.StateBase
This method is called whenever a state is entered.
enterState(S...) - Method in class nl.fontys.sebivenlo.statewalker.ContextBase
Enter a specific state hierarchy.
exit(C) - Method in interface nl.fontys.sebivenlo.statewalker.StateBase
This method is called whenever a state is left.

G

getDevice() - Method in class nl.fontys.sebivenlo.statewalker.ContextBase
Get the device for all operations.
getInitialState() - Method in interface nl.fontys.sebivenlo.statewalker.StateBase
This method is used to ask all states for their initial sub state, so that history can be implemented inside the framework.
getNullState() - Method in interface nl.fontys.sebivenlo.statewalker.StateBase
Get the default state that is to be on the bottom of the stack and 'implements' all event methods with empty bodies, or at least methods that do not all super.method nor reach down in the stack.
getTopState() - Method in class nl.fontys.sebivenlo.statewalker.ContextBase
Top state (child-most) state is the place where to enter the events.

isInitialStateDeepHistory() - Method in interface nl.fontys.sebivenlo.statewalker.StateBase
Is the initial state actually a deep history state?.
isInitialStateHistory() - Method in interface nl.fontys.sebivenlo.statewalker.StateBase

L

leaveState(S) - Method in class nl.fontys.sebivenlo.statewalker.ContextBase
Leave a state and all its sub-states in natural order.
leaveSubStates(S) - Method in class nl.fontys.sebivenlo.statewalker.ContextBase
Leave sub states of state, but not state itself.
logicalState() - Method in class nl.fontys.sebivenlo.statewalker.ContextBase
Produce a string to identify the sequence or nesting of states.

N

nl.fontys.sebivenlo.statewalker - package nl.fontys.sebivenlo.statewalker
A Java 8 enum based state machine implementation of the GoF State pattern.

O

ordinal() - Method in interface nl.fontys.sebivenlo.statewalker.StateBase
Get the ordinal number (the identity) of the state.

S

setDebug(boolean) - Method in class nl.fontys.sebivenlo.statewalker.ContextBase

Methods that should be available in all states to make the state walker api work.
superState(S) - Method in class nl.fontys.sebivenlo.statewalker.ContextBase
